```{python}
import os
from IPython.display import HTML
import urllib.request
import json
req = urllib.request.Request("https://api.github.com/users/ar90n/repos?per_page=4096")
req.add_header('Accept', 'application/vnd.github+json')
req.add_header('Authorization', os.environ.get("GITHUB_TOKEN"))

my_projects = {}
with urllib.request.urlopen(req) as res:
  for repo in json.loads(res.read().decode('utf-8')):
    if "my-projects" in repo["topics"]:
      my_projects.setdefault(repo["language"], []).append(repo)

tags = []
for lang, prjs in my_projects.items():
  card_tags = []
  for prj in prjs:
    card_tag = f"""<a href="https://github.com/{prj["full_name"]}"><img src="https://gh-card.dev/repos/{prj["full_name"]}.svg" style="margin: 3px"></a>"""
    card_tags.append(card_tag)
  tags.append(f"""<div>
        <h3>{lang}</h3>
        <div>{"".join(card_tags)}</div>
    </div>""")
HTML(f"""<div>{"".join(tags)}</div>""")
```
